info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:42PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pennington County through 415 PM MDT... At 342 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rapid City Airport, or 8 miles southeast of Rapid City, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Eastern Rapid Valley and Rapid City Airport around 350 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
